nodes.text: The Killblaster was a variation of the basic blaster pistol that greatly increased the attack of its wielder.

In the game, this ranged weapon is available only through the use of a cheat code. Additionally, the killblaster has the potential for instant death against an opponent. However, while the killblaster can be easily accessed in the PC version of the game, it is impossible to find in the XBox platform version.
The cheat to get this is: giveitem killblaster.
